KEEN.JK.summary: PT. Kencana Energi Lestari Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a renewable energy company in Indonesia. It owns and operates 3x6 MW hydroelectric power plant in Pakkat, North Sumatera; 3x7 MW hydroelectric power plant in Air Putih, Bengkulu; and 2x5 MW hydroelectric power plant in Madong, South Sulawesi. The company serves industries and homes. PT. Kencana Energi Lestari Tbk was founded in 2008 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

MPOW.JK.summary: PT Megapower Makmur Tbk operates as an independent power producing company in Indonesia. It generates and operates electricity from various energy sources, such as nuclear, coal, gas, fuel oil, diesel, hydro, solar, wind, marine, and geothermal, as well as provides power plant operation and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Megapower Makmur Tbk is a subsidiary of Bina Puri Power Sdn. Bhd.
